entries.content: Moti wants to scrape documentation for a library we're working with to create learning resources for future reference. Need to understand which library and create a systematic approach for doc scraping and knowledge storage.
Target: Anime.js documentation at https://animejs.com/documentation/getting-started. Will scrape comprehensive docs for animation system we're building for Semantix logo and other UI animations.

Successfully scraped complete Anime.js v4.0.0 documentation and created comprehensive delta memory at .sementix/memories/delta/animejs-complete-documentation-reference.json. Covers: installation, Timer/Animation/Timeline core concepts, SVG utilities, text splitting, draggable interactions, easing functions, utilities, WAAPI integration, best practices, common use cases, and Semantix-specific notes. Ready for building logo animations and UI interactions.

Created comprehensive Anime.js documentation in docs/animejs/ with 9 markdown files: README (overview), installation, timer, animation, timeline, svg, easing, and best-practices. Documentation includes code examples, use cases, performance tips, and Semantix-specific guidelines. Combined with delta memory for complete reference.

Moti expressed gratitude for the Anime.js documentation work. Successfully created both delta memory and markdown documentation covering all aspects of the animation library. Ready to proceed with logo animation implementation whenever needed.
